locations.title: TA Travel Center

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ size game room. The offer a basketball to play outside with the basketball net to let you get some juices flowing. The bathroom was clean, the shower was also clean, towels warm and the bathroom was dry! Not wet and humid. Soap was full and ‚Ä¶

This location Youngstown oh no respect for the drive especially the cashier girls I take feul I park the truck coming back asked shower I us all the time my phone number the  girl she refused give me a showe she tall me us the kiosk I don‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ mid night shift deliberately hide her work badge- a couple of times the ultra app didn‚Äôt work for me to purchase a shower and rudely refuses -plus she will start chatting with a people of her choice while you are standing there and waiting ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a check & advise on Trailer ABS light, possible air leak and tire patch. Checked in & went took shower and came back to shop..total time of 1.5 hrs I was out. FLETCH was the mechanic and TIM worked as TSA checking me in.. all were Friendly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ this TA was disgusting . Paid for a shower to be greeted with the stench of boo boo and a dirty shower that looked like someone just stepped out of it, pee on the toilet, hairs in the shower, and the wall . Asked for another shower to walk ‚Ä¶

My co driver and I came in to eat,  shower, fuel up and get coffee.  The cashiers greeted us immediately.  Nicole in Country Pride was fantastic & our food was equally impressive.  The showers are a little dated but they were clean and the ‚Ä¶

The shower was the coldest shower ever had at a truck stop, besides being dirty, they definitely don‚Äôt sweep the floors so that tells me the floors aren‚Äôt mopped either good thing for flip flops. No food restaurant still not open they could ‚Ä¶

The pros,shower was hot with good water pressure and plenty of parking. The cons,the place is old. Needs some tender care. Restaurant didn't look appealing. The layout of the store is just all wrong. So,I would recommend shower and book...

Went in for shower, it was so digusting. Didn't clean it at all. In this uncertain times, We, truck drivers, dont ask much. Only clean showers and hot meals. There was hair and used bar of soap. I hope management can see this. You can see ‚Ä¶

Nice and clean strong shower ! Restaurant food was awesome ! Lots of drunks and snacks varieties ! truck parking is well clean and most of the spots empty so it was easy to get parking spot even 7-8 pm

showerReviews.reviewText:
very terrible. we ordered a shower cabin.
stood waiting for 2 hours. the shower was open and dirty.
towels were lying on the floor. there was no employee to clean. the employees do ‚Ä¶
01/11 the parking lot is still not cleaned, there is no explanation as to why the pump only area should be plowed..please show some decent respect to the drivers that keep your business alive

Learn to work and respect yourself and others. If you don't like your job or home, don't work. The staff is rude, lazy. Terrible service. If you want to take a shower, be prepared to wait forever for it to be cleaned.
If you want to take a shower, you will wait forever, even if there is no one in front of you in line. There are 3 in front of me. And there were 3 an hour ago.

Parking alot is big but I booked a shower here 1 guy  before me no one care about to clean the shower it‚Äôs 1 hour  and I am still waiting for it don‚Äôt waste your time go ahead and take shower at next station and save your time

Amazing truck stop. Plenty available spaces for trucks even at night. Showers are clean like brand new. Water is as hot as you want and great pressureüëçI‚Äôm not saying it‚Äôs the best one, because all truck stops in Ohio are great. But if ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This post is regarding the showers, they are not clean and you can smell the mold and mildew when you open the door! There is noticeable black mold everywhere this is no exaggeration!! I know we‚Äôre just Truck Drivers but we deserve a clean ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Upon another visit the reviews weren't lying about the shower. The water smells funny and you can see a black film forming on the floors and walls of the showers. They're in need of a serious deep clean. They obviously dont police the ‚Ä¶

Stopped in here to shower and very disgusting, smelled horribly and literally they said they just cleaned it. Small no room to move around and mold everywhere waste of one of my credits cause I didn‚Äôt even stay

I went in for a shower and dinner. The shower was good with plenty of hot water and a clean room. When I finished I went to eat. Not many people there when I arrived so I could sit wherever I wanted. The server was great and the food was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stops as it is !  Nasty and rude people work at these truck stops !  Don‚Äôt come to burp in a customers face to the dreadhead shower guy !  And to the middle aged white lady , I can walk however I want !  Stop with the harassment people . ‚Ä¶

Shower was great. We got to use the handicap shower since there were 2 of us. It was good sized and had a handheld shower sprayer. Water pressure was perfect. No soft water treatment to make u feel all slimy. Restaurant was even open.

Bad experience  parking lot was dirty and $35 dinner and a $ 16 shower and the Washer and dryer was $ 3 dollars  shower sink water didn't have  Pressure.                I say it little bit over price.  I never stop there at any more petro ‚Ä¶
Shower was amazing,  a little dated, water was HOT AF! Iron skillet was good, Clean and polite staff.

Food is great from the fuel island. However, I went to shower and there is hair all over the sink still and some missing tiles off the floor (shower 7) and obvious cracking in the wall tiles. You make plenty of money Petro. Manage your ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ pretty good but hot portion looked pretty lame so I did not try it.  Walked in to get a shower and the kiosk showed no shower and would not print my fuel receipt.  Clerk would not help with as he could not have cared less.  Walk back to ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ ever, and they are price gouging with the best of them. What really pissed me off though was they would not let me pay for a shower without holding my debit card while I showered. That's total bs, what am I gonna do to your shower? Yet ‚Ä¶
The shower was like taking one at home. The people are all nice as hell. Definitely, we'll be stopping here every chance I have time
I got fuel at Truckworld last night and took advantage of a free shower. ‚Ä¶

Great truck stop it has everything that you would need. I only have one problem with this truck stop ,, The showers are from the 70's. They are old and moldy.. Also they let people smoke in the shower rooms.. I don't want to leave a shower ‚Ä¶
A little creepy. But good stop.to grab a shower or nap.when on a long drive.

I don‚Äôt leave reviews EVER! But this use to be one of my favorite places to stop and shower. Seems like the new shower cleaner does not take pride in the job. A year ago these shower rooms were very clean. Now they are full of mold and soap ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ (cash only), chiropractor (I have yet to get an adjustment because I can‚Äôt catch him open, tool store, chrome shop. Privately owned. Free shower with fuel purchase.  Nice folks in every area.  Clean showers!  We need more like this one.

Free parking and a 10 dollar Shower was nice, stocked up for the next day in the convenience store, also ate at the bar. Salad needed work but most do, it was the cheesy ravioli that's was pretty good.

Hot shower with real key. It's a must stop. The food is great.  They have a hot dog place , pub / bar food and a nice sit down restaurant.  The stuffed  fish is good.  Chrome store that has clothing,  birthday cards,  kid toys and most ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ back into 1975, except prices. Though prices are a little less then big chain truckstops. Friendly staff and good food. Does have a bar for you drinkers. Not a bad place to shower, eat and relax. Also some cool gifts and flying toys.

One of the better flying j's.  Good shower pressure & hot water.  The wokers are nice.  Can usually find parking as long as you arrive at a reasonable time.  Decent food . Dennys & waffle house nextdoor. The prime parking is on the side ‚Ä¶

Very nice staff.! Honestly, the nicest I've encountered at a Flying J. Biggest & cleanest showers. :) Amazing shower pressure.

By far this is one of.the cleanest truck stops I have been to. Showers are clean and roomy,  toilet clean, blow dryer nice flow of water from shower head, shower and floor clean, nice friendly service multiple washers and dryers plenty of ‚Ä¶
The shower service is missing... 15 showers and only 4 are active, the staff only cleans when there are people waiting and they are two by two, all of them should be active

This is a nice Flying J. Bathrooms and shower were clean and everyone I encountered that worked there was friendly and helpful. Did a load of laundry and washer and dryer both did a good job. My only complaint is the outside music is WAY ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ size game room. The offer a basketball to play outside with the basketball net to let you get some juices flowing. The bathroom was clean, the shower was also clean, towels warm and the bathroom was dry! Not wet and humid. Soap was full and ‚Ä¶

This location Youngstown oh no respect for the drive especially the cashier girls I take feul I park the truck coming back asked shower I us all the time my phone number the  girl she refused give me a showe she tall me us the kiosk I don‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ mid night shift deliberately hide her work badge- a couple of times the ultra app didn‚Äôt work for me to purchase a shower and rudely refuses -plus she will start chatting with a people of her choice while you are standing there and waiting ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a check & advise on Trailer ABS light, possible air leak and tire patch. Checked in & went took shower and came back to shop..total time of 1.5 hrs I was out. FLETCH was the mechanic and TIM worked as TSA checking me in.. all were Friendly ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ this TA was disgusting . Paid for a shower to be greeted with the stench of boo boo and a dirty shower that looked like someone just stepped out of it, pee on the toilet, hairs in the shower, and the wall . Asked for another shower to walk ‚Ä¶

My co driver and I came in to eat,  shower, fuel up and get coffee.  The cashiers greeted us immediately.  Nicole in Country Pride was fantastic & our food was equally impressive.  The showers are a little dated but they were clean and the ‚Ä¶

The shower was the coldest shower ever had at a truck stop, besides being dirty, they definitely don‚Äôt sweep the floors so that tells me the floors aren‚Äôt mopped either good thing for flip flops. No food restaurant still not open they could ‚Ä¶

The pros,shower was hot with good water pressure and plenty of parking. The cons,the place is old. Needs some tender care. Restaurant didn't look appealing. The layout of the store is just all wrong. So,I would recommend shower and book...

Went in for shower, it was so digusting. Didn't clean it at all. In this uncertain times, We, truck drivers, dont ask much. Only clean showers and hot meals. There was hair and used bar of soap. I hope management can see this. You can see ‚Ä¶

Nice and clean strong shower ! Restaurant food was awesome ! Lots of drunks and snacks varieties ! truck parking is well clean and most of the spots empty so it was easy to get parking spot even 7-8 pm
